title: We love: fashion fixes for the week ahead – in pictures
description: Upcycled tea towel ties, Helmut Newton’s Berlin and cosy knits Continue reading...
author: Jo Jones and Helen Seamons
excerpt: Upcycled tea towel ties, Helmut Newton’s Berlin and cosy knits
text: Second time aroundAdam Jones’s designs use upcycled vintage materials, such as beer towels, tea towels, scarves and flags. Jones takes his inspiration from the British pub aesthetic and tapping into the cultural and historical associations of these fabrics. All orders are made to order and may take up to two weeks to produce. Tie, £95, shop-adamjones
html:
Second time around

Adam Jones’s designs use upcycled vintage materials, such as beer towels, tea towels, scarves and flags. Jones takes his inspiration from the British pub aesthetic and tapping into the cultural and historical associations of these fabrics. All orders are made to order and may take up to two weeks to produce. Tie, £95, shop-adamjones
